1. Position the Ball: Stand against a wall with the mini fitness ball placed between your lower back and the wall.
2. Slide Down: Slowly slide down the wall until your knees are at a 90-degree angle, keeping your thighs parallel to the ground.
3. Hold the Position: Press your back into the ball, engage your core, and hold the position for as long as you can.
